casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Thomas COLEY 2A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2019 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Coley, John Thomas Michael T. Henry, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of January 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of January 2019."
